synopsis.text:
The anime follows Iria, a tenacious and skilled apprentice bounty hunter, as she embarks on a perilous mission to uncover the truth behind the monstrous alien entity known as Zeiram. When her brother, a renowned bounty hunter, takes on a job to investigate a mysterious incident at a space station, Iria joins him, only to discover a horrifying massacre. As they delve deeper into the case, they learn that Zeiram, a seemingly invincible and dangerous life form, has been secretly imported by the Tedan Tippedai Corporation to create a powerful bio-weapon.

With her brother brutally killed by Zeiram, Iria seeks vengeance and sets out to expose the corporation's sinister plot. Alongside her young sidekick, Kei, and an enigmatic benefactor, Iria must navigate a web of conspiracies and stop Zeiram before it claims more innocent lives. In a world where corporations hold sway, Iria's determination and skills will be put to the ultimate test as she hunts down the unstoppable alien, but will she become the hunter or the hunted? Join Iria in this action-packed OVA series as she races against time to unravel the secrets behind Zeiram and bring it to justice.
